name: Amit Hapase
bio: Full Stack Web Developer with 3 months of experience in Python and Django RESTful APIs
detailedBio: I am a Red Hat Certified Engineer & System Administrator, skilled in configuring PostgreSQL on AWS RDS, setting up AWS S3 and Linux EC2 for storage and server solutions, and managing version control with Git. Experienced in testing APIs using Postman and proficient in React.js, Django REST API, JavaScript and Golang REST API.
